whosyourdaddy.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002     @file
00003     whosyourdaddy - who's the parent patcher
00004     jeremy bernstein - jeremy@bootsquad.com 
00005 
00006     @ingroup    examples    
00007 */
00008 
00009 #include "ext.h"                            // standard Max include, always required
00010 #include "ext_obex.h"                       // required for new style Max object
00011 #include "jpatcher_api.h"
00012 
00013 ////////////////////////// object struct
00014 typedef struct _whosyourdaddy 
00015 {
00016     t_object                    a_ob;           // the object itself (must be first)
00017 } t_whosyourdaddy;
00018 
00019 ///////////////////////// function prototypes
00020 //// standard set
00021 void *whosyourdaddy_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00022 void whosyourdaddy_free(t_whosyourdaddy *x);
00023 void whosyourdaddy_assist(t_whosyourdaddy *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00024 //// additional methods
00025 void whosyourdaddy_bang(t_whosyourdaddy *x); // incoming bang message
00026 
00027 //////////////////////// global class pointer variable
00028 void *whosyourdaddy_class;
00029 
00030 int main(void)
00031 {   
00032     t_class *c;
00033         
00034     c = class_new("whosyourdaddy", (method)whosyourdaddy_new, (method)whosyourdaddy_free, (long)sizeof(t_whosyourdaddy), 0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00035 
00036     class_addmethod(c, (method)whosyourdaddy_bang, "bang", 0);
00037     class_addmethod(c, (method)whosyourdaddy_assist,            "assist",       A_CANT, 0);  
00038 
00039     class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00040     whosyourdaddy_class = c;
00041 
00042     return 0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void whosyourdaddy_assist(t_whosyourdaddy *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00046 {
00047     if (m == ASSIST_INLET) { //inlet
00048         sprintf(s, "I am inlet %ld", a);
00049     } 
00050     else {  // outlet
00051         sprintf(s, "I am outlet %ld", a);           
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 void whosyourdaddy_bang(t_whosyourdaddy *x)
00056 {
00057     t_object *jp;
00058     t_object *jbx;
00059     t_object *o;
00060     t_max_err err;
00061 
00062     // get the object's parent patcher
00063     err = object_obex_lookup(x, gensym("#P"), (t_object **)&jp);
00064     if (err != MAX_ERR_NONE)
00065         return;
00066     
00067     // some kind of patcher in a box
00068     if (jbx = jpatcher_get_box(jp)) {
00069         t_symbol *filepath = object_attr_getsym((t_object *)jp, gensym("filepath"));
00070         
00071 //      post("object_classname(jbx): %s, object_classname(o): %s, filepath: %s", object_classname(jbx)->s_name, object_classname(jbox_get_object(jbx))->s_name, filepath->s_name);
00072         if (object_classname(jbx) == gensym("bpatcher")) {
00073             post("bpatcher");
00074         } else {
00075             if (filepath && filepath != gensym("")) {
00076                 post("abstraction");
00077             } else {
00078                 post("subpatcher");
00079             }
00080         }
00081     } else {
00082         t_object *p2;
00083         t_object *target;
00084         t_object *nextbox;
00085         method m;
00086         
00087         object_method(jp, gensym("getassoc"), &target);
00088         if (target) {
00089             if (m = zgetfn(target, gensym("parentpatcher")))
00090                 (*m)(target, &p2);
00091             if (p2) {
00092                 nextbox = jpatcher_get_firstobject(p2);
00093                 while (nextbox) {
00094                     o = jbox_get_object(nextbox);
00095                     if (o == target) {
00096                         post("%s", object_classname(o)->s_name);
00097                         return;
00098                     }
00099                     nextbox = jbox_get_nextobject(nextbox);
00100                 }
00101             }
00102         }
00103     }
00104 }

00108 }

00110 void *whosyourdaddy_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00111 {
00112     t_whosyourdaddy *x = NULL;
00113 
00114     if (x = (t_whosyourdaddy *)object_alloc(whosyourdaddy_class)) {
00115     }
00116     return (x);
